name: 蘇昭瑾
objective:
本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有
(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
schedule:
02/26  Principle  Introduction to Surface Science
03/05-03/26  From Single Crystal, Single Crystal Surfaces to Structure of Solid Surfaces
04/02-04/09  Adsorption, Bonding and Kinetics of Surface Adsorption
04/16   Get Ready to Surface Science
04/23   Mid Term Examination
04/30 Technique Electron-material Interaction
05/07-05/14  Electron Spectroscopy:
  X-ray photoelectron Spectroscopy (XPS) Auger Electron Spectroscopy (AES)
05/21  Low Energy Electron Diffraction (LEED)
05/28-06/04  Scanning Probe Microscopy:
Scanning Tunneling Microscopy (STM) Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM)
06/11  Temperature Programmed Desorption (TPD)
06/18  Surface Vibrational Spectroscopy (HREELS, FT-IR)
06/25  Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid Term Examination: 40%　　　　Final Examination: 40%
Absent and Tardy: 20%
